message_1: Suppose in a Dictator Game, the dictator has $100 to divide between themselves and the receiver. What is the maximum amount the dictator can keep for themselves while still offering the receiver more than $10?
message_2: In the Dictator Game, the dictator must offer the receiver more than $10. To maximize the amount the dictator can keep for themselves, they can offer the receiver just slightly more than $10, for example, $10.01. In this case, the dictator can keep $100 - $10.01 = $89.99 for themselves.
